content.json:
## Security Overview
---

This workbook contains information from your SenservaPro scanner. This will inlcude all tenants that you manage that are included in your scanner configuration


Below are some metrics to help you get a basic idea of what data SenservaPro collects and how they can be used for reporting.

content.title: Controls over Time

content.query:
SenservaPro_CL
| summarize Total=count() by Type=Group_s
| render columnchart
content.title: Security Issues by Type Across all Tenants

content.query:
SenservaPro_CL
| summarize count() by ControlName_s
| top 10 by ControlName_s
| render piechart
content.title: Top Security Issues Across All Tenants

content.query:
SenservaPro_CL
| summarize Total_Score=sum(Weight_d) by Tenant_Name=Tenant_TenantDisplayName_s, TenantId=Tenant_TenantId_g, TimeGenerated
| order by Total_Score desc
content.title: Ranked Tenants in Need of Review by Score

content.query:
SenservaPro_CL
| summarize Total_Score=sum(Weight_d) by Value_s, Home_Tenant=Tenant_TenantDisplayName_s
| order by Total_Score desc
| top 10 by Total_Score
| project JSON_Data=parse_json(Value_s), Home_Tenant, Total_Score
content.title: Top 10 Items by Score

content.query:
SenservaPro_CL
| order by Weight_d
| project TimeGenerated, ControlName_s, Weight_d, JSON_Data=parse_json(Value_s), Description_s
| render table
content.title: Controls Ordered By Score
Average Score Over Time
